name: A Single Night With Sans Undertale
name_original: A Single Night With Sans Undertale
description:
Sans is coming to get you.

There is literally nothing else to this.

I made this game in two days and I'm too tired to care.

Please understand that this game is a joke game in its current state. I just wanted to test out a few mechanics to see how they would work in case I decided to make something else with the same or similar mechanics. I don't have much modelling or artistic experience so it's not likely this will ever go anywhere serious.
